<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_notification_va_content_messaging</collection> <condition>!current.header_customization_script || current.header_customization_script.includes("return { cardHeading: '', cardLinkText: '', cardLinkUrl: '' }")</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set default value for header script</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
current.header_customization_script = "(function getNotificationHeadingAndMessage(
" + "	/*GlideRecord of record changed to cause notification*/ target,
" + "	/*GlideRecord of event triggered to cause notification*/ event,
" + "	/*Recipient Table Name*/ recipientTable,
" + "	/*Recipient Sys Id*/ recipientSysId) {
" + "	
" + "	return { cardLinkUrl: '' };
" + "	
})(target, event, recipientTable, recipientSysId);";
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-08-09 03:02:31</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>068ba50053d111100b6fddeeff7b12e1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set default value for header script</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Virtual Agent integration with notifications" source="com.glide.cs.notification">e18d78203c75311068bcf327dfe37f16</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_068ba50053d111100b6fddeeff7b12e1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-08-09 03:02:31</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before_display</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=068ba50053d111100b6fddeeff7b12e1"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set default value for header script
